name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished professional with 8 years of expertise in technical presentation, customer satisfaction, and effective communication, transitioning into the role of Senior Sales Engineer. I leverage my strong background in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to deliver compelling business solutions tailored to client needs. My technical prowess includes proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, with extensive cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**.

My robust understanding of **internet security**, **internet protocols**, and compliance standards such as **Security+**, **CISSP**, and **CEH** enables me to convey complex technical concepts effectively to clients. I am adept at utilizing presentation tools to engage stakeholders and drive customer satisfaction. Furthermore, my experience in building and implementing secure, enterprise-grade platforms enhances my ability to support sales strategies with real-world outcomes and solutions that address client challenges.
